title: Junglers
body: I'm a Jungle main... I really need to know some good junglers for 3150 IP. They are Pantheon{{champion:80}}, Shaco{{champion:35}}, Shyvana{{champion:102}} and Nidalee{{champion:76}}. I need your opinion on whom to buy. Plz suggest and if you need a Jungle main for your team plz add me.

replies.body:
+ I wouldn't recommend {{champion:76}} **Nidalee** unless your mechanics are quite high. 

+ {{champion:35}} **Shaco** is really good for solo queue but his playstyle is quite different from other champions, which can make him hard to pick up.

+ {{champion:80}} **Pantheon** got a big buff this patch with the new {{item:3147}} _Duskblade of Draktharr_. He's fairly straight forward but can have a weak late game.

+ {{champion:102}} **Shyvanna** is the one I'd recommend. You'll out farm every other jungler except maybe {{champion:77}} **Udyr**. Her ganks mid lane are bad, but top and bot ganks can work with practice. Although she is best at counter ganking other junglers.

Shaco/pantheon are the only ones i would suggest off your list.

Nidalee is trash tier, and honestly has been for months.

Shyvana is a farm jungler, and really is being a threat too late into the game to mean anything.
Nidalee trash tier.. hmmm... Nidalee is godtier in the hands of high elo players.

Nidalee is trash tier, the only reason she is ever good is if you straight out outclass the enemies, and then there are still better champs to go.

Not to mention, no one on here is high elo, or else they wouldn't ask what junglers they should be playing.

Fact is i am a really decent nidalee player, and love her as a champion, but she sucks ass right now.

> [{quoted}](name=M2001ARYAN,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XWFL32l1,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-02-14T08:58:07.246+0000)
>
> Then can you tell me a jungler worth my investment?

weeeeeell if you do wanna play panth or shaco or even shyvana thats totally fine as long as you dont feed too hard in most games. learn as much as you can and maybe get some tips off the internet before heading into ranked with them, and over time you'll learn to play around your strengths and weaknesses and each game that passes in which your selected main/s could physically have not done anything at all to help your feeding team becomes reduced as you yourself (if that makes sense)

otherwise some quick suggestions, tryn is 1350 and hes a jungler or even a top laner, usually. he has a dash, a slow, an AD steroid, and of course his crazy broken ult. his early damage isnt that great for a gank but his slow is so easy to land and he does have a heal, and a way to dash out (if you didnt use it) which means he could gank a lot of possible bot lane matchups if your teammates know how to followup

udyrs also 1350IP. hes a lot harder to play but if you're 12 years old or younger you might like watching trick2g who plays mainly udyr and hes really good at it. theres a lot more udyr can do over shyvana or tryndamere, even in the early game, to help prevent your teammates feeding 

but i think besides panth, your safest and best bet to get a jungler might have to be gragas. im pretty sure its the next patch he gets buffed (unless its this one) so you could pretty much instalock him every game as a jungler and he'll do well with...a lot of team comps. if his jungle clear isnt any worse than it was before it could be really easy to learn and hes great at so many stages of the game
